interfaces

Interface Serverable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServerController

    public interface Serverable
    Interaface that implemented in the ServerController class

      void broadcast(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String message)
      Handles the sending of a broadcast message to all users.

      void stopReceivingSockets()
      Connect to myself will cause to exist from main loop by turning isServerRunng to false
      void stopServerClients()
      Send SERVERCLOSED message to every client, tell them them to disconnect, then the server closes connection from his side in the while loop in every thread.

    • Method Detail

      • initServer

        void initServer(boolean firstRun)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Calls new thread for every server instance.
        Parameters:
        firstRun - find if view is already built
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if connection error occurs

      • initView

        void initView()
       throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Initialize the GUI that came from the constructor.
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException

      • stopReceivingSockets

        void stopReceivingSockets()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Connect to myself will cause to exist from main loop by turning isServerRunng to false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when connection error occurs

      • unicast

        void unicast(java.lang.String name,
             java.lang.String message,
             java.lang.String toUser)
      throws java.io.IOException
        Handles the sending of a unicast message to a specified user. Search for the targeted client name, send message and breaking from loop.
        Parameters:
        name - sender
        message - text to be send
        toUser - target
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when connection error occurs

      • broadcast

        void broadcast(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String message)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Handles the sending of a broadcast message to all users. Runs on every client thread and sends the message.
        Parameters:
        name - sender
        message - text to be sent
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when connection error occurs

      • stopServerClients

        void stopServerClients()
                throws java.io.IOException
        Send SERVERCLOSED message to every client, tell them them to disconnect, then the server closes connection from his side in the while loop in every thread. After the loop, server will stop recieving sockets by calling the stopReceivingSockets() method.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when connection error occurs
